<title level="1" right="Hazard 6" pfs="">[Hallucination Powder Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=471)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 102 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A tube of hallucinogenic powder armed with a miniature explosive is connected to a doorknob or similar latch.

---

**Stealth**
DC 24 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 26 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (expert) to disable the hammer that strikes the percussion cap

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 24, **Fort** +0, **Ref** +0

**Hardness**
0

**HP**
1

**Immunities**
[critical hits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2190), [object immunities](/Rules.aspx?ID=2161), precision damage

</column>

**Powder Burst** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669)) **Trigger** The latch is opened or the tube is broken; **Effect** The tube explodes, spraying hallucinogenic powder in a 30-foot [cone](/Rules.aspx?ID=2386). Any creature in the cone must succeed at a DC 24 Will save or be [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63) for 1 round and take a –2 status penalty to [Perception](/Rules.aspx?ID=3303) checks and saves against mental effects for 1d4 hours. On a critical failure, the penalty is instead –4.
name: Hallucination Powder Trap
